FX.name: Ba Detune
FX.description: By mixing a small amount of the pitch-shifted effect sound with the original sound, a natural bass chorus effect is achieved.

Parameters.name: Cent
Parameters.explanation: Adjusts the detuning in cents, which are fine increments of 1/100-semitone.

Parameters.name: PreD
Parameters.explanation: Sets the pre-delay time of the effect sound.

Parameters.name: Mix
Parameters.explanation: Adjusts the amount of effected sound that is mixed with the original sound.
